title: Deep and surface mining coal production in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 1970 to 2018
summary: Overall Surface mining is gradually increasing, Deep mined is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The order of lines according to average values of Production volume in thousand metric tons, in descending order is: 1. Surface mining, and lastly, 2. Deep mined.
The minimum Production volume in thousand metric tons about 7674.0, occured at 2015 by Deep mined.
The greatest difference of Production volume in thousand metric tons between Deep mined and Surface mining occurs at Year 2016 and the smallest difference occurs at 2015.
yAxis: Production volume in thousand metric tons
